name: Flippy Geometry 3D Puzzles meditation game
description:
Flippy Geometry 3D Puzzles is a brand new 3D game & brain teaser game! The gameplay is very simple and relaxing: rotate the puzzle pieces, and as you get closer to the correct angle, the pieces will merge into a beautiful picture of artwork!

🍭Download, play and if you don't like the game, you can get your money back!🍭

If you are interested in coloring puzzle art and low poly art game or stress relief , Flippy Geometry 3D Puzzles with low-poly illustration is one of the best choices for you.

3D Puzzle designed for families.
Test your brain if you love poly and brain games!
3D puzzles are perfect for relaxation and meditation. This is an indie game developed by one person. If you have ideas on how to improve it or want new levels - do not hesitate, write to the mail or in the reviews.

Flippy Geometry 3D Puzzles FEATURES:

- 🐟 Chillout music

- 🐟 ASMR effect

- 🐟 No ads.

- 🐟 Super relaxing gameplay: no time limit, no restrictions, take your time and relax with this creative puzzle game. Rotate the picture to match.

- 🐟 Tons of 3D poly puzzles to solve! Challenge your brain and unlock all unique artworks!

- 🐟 Anti-stress effect of polysphere puzzle

- 🐟 Improves concentration and imagination.

- 🐟 Enjoy with animal pictures, fruits puzzle, polygon graphics, shards and many coloring artworks which appropriate for all ages.

- 🐟 10+ different categories (training, holidays, drawings, sketch, blueprints, steampunk, aquarium world, candy and animals, Christmas and New Year - feel like Santa Claus 🌲)

- 🐟 Play without internet. Offline game.

- 🐟 Family games.
